CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 20, 1961, pg. 15 reads:"May Festival Contestants - Above are the contestants in May Festival, slated for Sixth Mt. Zion Church, May 19, at 8 P.M. No. 1: Miss Paulette Whitaker, Macedonia Baptist Church, Duquesne.  Second row: Judy Sadik, Rodman Street Church, and Gena Davis, St. James AME.  Third row: Charlene Brown, Park Place AME, Homestead; A. Hardy, Sixth Mt. Zion, and H. Hunt, Second Baptist, Homestead.  Fourth row: Mary J. Eaton, Askew Family, Lucille L. Sawyer, Morning Star Baptist, Clairton, and Ruby Brown, Bethel AME, Pittsburgh.  Not shown are Joyce Sharpe, Wesley Center AME Zion, and Susan Carroll, Trinity AME, Pittsburgh.  Mrs. Edna Lindsay is director and general chairman, and Mrs. Barbara Bush and Mabel Holmes are co-chairmen. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of May Festival contestants, from left, first row: Paulette Whitaker; second row: Judy Sadik, Gena Davis; third row: Charlene Brown, A. Hardy, H. Hunt; fourth row: Mary J. Eaton, Lucille L. Sawyer, and Ruby Brown, standing in diamond formation on stairs, with church building in background
